description_en: A shoulders exercise focusing on the lateral deltoid.
description_ar: تمرين shoulders يركز على lateral deltoid.
instructions_en: Raise to shoulder level only (not higher)
tips_en: Using too much weight → Ego check, lighter weight
Raising too high → Stop at shoulder level
Shrugging traps → Depress shoulders, think "long neck"

description_en: A shoulders exercise focusing on the lateral deltoid (extended rom).

Increases tension at bottom of movement

description_en: A shoulders exercise focusing on the lateral deltoid.
description_ar: تمرين shoulders يركز على lateral deltoid.
instructions_en: Grip wider than shoulder width (reduces impingement)
Pull elbows up and out (not just up)
Stop when elbows reach shoulder level
Don't let wrists go higher than elbows
